title: Gmail API List Threads in Mailbox Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the List Threads in Mailbox operation in Gmail API

nextPageToken.description: Page token to retrieve the next page of results in the list.

threads.description: List of threads. Note that each thread resource does not contain a list of `messages`. The list of `messages` for a given thread can be fetched using the threads.get method.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
